item.title: We Have a Winner!
item.description:
We have a winner! The Stonehouse family is the lucky winner of our office drawing for a 55‚Äù flat screen TV and a really nice Home Entertainment System. Congratulations!

Everyone who referred a patient to our office got three tickets for the drawing. All of us here at Maple Tree Dental sincerely appreciate it when people feel good enough about our office that they refer their friends and family. It is the ultimate compliment. We work hard at making your experience with us as rewarding as possible with excellent cutting edge dentistry and over the top customer service. Our thanks to all of you!

Tags: 
giveaway
item.dc:creator: Dr. Inge

item.title: This Home Theater System Can Be Yours!
item.description:
Things are getting a little crazy around here. We're having a drawing! It's for a Home Theater System that is designed to blow your mind. (And maybe your eardrums too, if you are not careful.)

The Home Theater system features a 55" Full HD Smart LED TV, a Wi-Fi and 3D Blu-ray, a 5.1 Channel Home Theater, and LOTS of exciting extras.

And the drawing is easy to enter. Just refer one patient to our office and you get three coupons for the drawing. Refer a second patient and get four more coupons on top of the three. And from then on for every patient you refer to our office you get FIVE MORE coupons. Yeah, it's crazy, but it's going to be a lot of fun for the winner!

Tags: 
giveaway
item.dc:creator: Dr. Inge
